level1.c3: Move 1 time to the right. ("Play" & "Reset" button)

level2.c2: Reach the end of the room.

level3.c1: Reach the checkpoint on the floor above.

level4.c1: Reach the checkpoint on the fourth floor.

level5.c4: Teleport a distance equal to the sum of the 11 first numbers in the Fibonacci sequence to the right.

level6.c1: Write the sum of the first 3 tiles into the last tile.

level7.c1: Get to the 5th level of this room, on the rightmost tile. Use the number tiles to know when to jump.

level8.c1: Get to the number tile that contains a 0. Number tiles containing -1 tell you to jump and walk left, and those with 1 tell you to jump and walk right.
